properties.address: Seaton Methodist Church, Seaton, Devon EX12 2ST
properties.description: A warm safe space for everyone who lives in East Devon to enjoy. We provide a hot meal every session along with drinks and snacks, daily newspapers and magazines. We play games and make things, we have regular craft workshops but also budgeting advice, help accessing benefits and access to council services. There is always a warm welcome whether you want to join in, make friends, meet your neighbours or just want to sit and be quiet – we will welcome you. All activities and meals are free, including a Christmas dinner and Diwali feast!
properties.title: EDDC Community Hub

properties.address: Lyme Regis Library, Lyme Regis, Dorset DT7 3HR
properties.description: We are open Monday 10-1pm, Tuesday 10-1pm, Wednesday 2-5pm, Friday 12-6pm, Saturday 10-1pm We welcome anyone to come and enjoy our warm spaces. Find a quiet corner to work, study or read. Or join in with one of our many free activities for all ages to create something, learn something, write something, read with a group, play games or just have a drink, chat and make connections with others at our Coffee companions sessions. Computer use is free. What’s on in Dorset libraries https://www.dorsetcouncil.gov.uk/whats-on-in-dorset-libraries
properties.title: Lyme Regis Library

properties.address: Dorset Council, Lyme Regis, Dorset DT7 3HR
properties.description: The space is open to all. Cuppa and Company sessions: Every Tuesday 10:15am - 12:15pm
